alert.note: Alert for Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 19 at 2:35PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is possible. * WHERE...The cities of Yakutat, Elfin Cove, and Pelican. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, other low-lying areas and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rain may fall on a deep primed snowpack leading to the melt increasing. Rainfall totals of 6 to 8 inches possible. Flows in rivers may increase quickly and reach critical levels.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop. Persons living along streams should stay alert and be prepared to take action if a warning or advisory is issued, or flooding is observed.

area.areaDesc: Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
